about_me.title: About me
about_me.content:
I grew up on beautiful San Juan Island Washington, you could call me an islaaaand boy. While on the island I worked as a diver and worked towards obtaining my private pilot's liscence while playing several sports. After high school I attended the University of Washington to learn Biology.

While I loved the science world it wasn't the career I wanted to pursue so I quit my job and went to a accelerated programming course in 2015. I feel in love with programing and got a job at Extreme Arts & Sciences, a small digital agency in Seattle, WA. I learned everything I know there and worked my way up from being a know nothing junior developer to head of development and a part owner. We will see what happens next!

-Jens

about_the_site.title: About the site
about_the_site.content:
This site was create by hand from the ground up by Jens Townsdin

Technologies utilized

  • Frontend: React.js
  • Backend (for contact form and serving): .Net
  • Database: MySQL
  • Serving Architecture: Docker on Amazong ECS
